code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import SearchBar from'./SearchBar/SearchBar.component';import EmailCard from'./email/email.component';import'./SidebarView.styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SidebarView=_ref=>{let{emails,onEmailSelect}=_ref;const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');const filteredEmails=emails.filter(email=>email.subject.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()));const handleEmailClick=selectedEmail=>{onEmailSelect(selectedEmail);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"heading",children:"Email Sidebar View"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBar,{placeholder:"Search Bar",handleInput:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"email-list",children:filteredEmails.map(email=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EmailCard,{email:email,onClick:()=>handleEmailClick(email)},email.id))})]});};export default SidebarView;
